title: Is there a way to change my account birth date? or see what it currently is?
body: I saw a post a while back about someone who got locked out of their account because they didn't know old account info. I was wondering if there is a way to change or see what the info currently is? When I first made this account I was younger and can't remember if I used my correct birth date or not. I don't want not knowing to come back and screw me over later.

replies.body: so you cant fix it, what if you contact them and ask for a change

There isn't a way to get that information since it's considered personal account info. It might not have been the best idea to use a fake birthdate, but don't worry that won't get you locked out of your account. There are plenty of options for account recovery and simply getting one wrong doesn't hurt you.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Ori0dcMA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-25T20:33:05.228+0000)
>
> There isn't a way to get that information since it's considered personal account info. It might not have been the best idea to use a fake birthdate, but don't worry that won't get you locked out of your account. There are plenty of options for account recovery and simply getting one wrong doesn't hurt you.

Yea it was pretty stupid of me. Thanks for answering.
